description: This Dart file defines a RecipeProvider class which manages the state and operations related to recipes in a Flutter app. It handles loading recipes from a repository, searching, filtering by tags, and notifying listeners about state changes.

classes.name: RecipeProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier subclass that manages recipe data, including loading, searching, and filtering recipes, and notifying UI components of changes.

methods.name: RecipeProvider
methods.description: Constructor that optionally accepts a RecipeRepository; initializes the provider.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the provider by loading all recipes from the repository.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads all recipes from the repository, resets search and filter states.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Performs a case-insensitive search across recipe titles and tags, updating the visible list.

methods.name: clearSearch
methods.description: Clears current search query, resetting to the filtered list based on active tag.

methods.name: filterByTag
methods.description: Filters recipes by an exact tag, applying search filter if any.

methods.name: _baseListConsideringTag
methods.description: Returns the current base list considering the active tag filter.

methods.name: _setLoading
methods.description: Sets the loading state and notifies listeners.
